snippet.title: What's New in Farlight 84? An In-Depth Look
snippet.description:
Let’s take a moment to revisit the exciting new features of Farlight 84 to make sure you’re up to speed!

ABOUT FARLIGHT 84

In Farlight 84, you get to play as heroes with unique skills to outsmart your enemies, unleashing special abilities to catch them off guard... AND you get to collect adorable Buddies to join you as loyal companions in battle. Buddy up, it’s time to Battle Royale!

FOLLOW US
